This game works perfect on Windows 7 Professional 64-bit.

I mounted the cue file with: Daemon Tools Lite 4.41.3.0173

Ran the installer, waited for installation to complete.

Got a no-cd crack from gamecopyworld, put that into the game directory and voila loads perfectly :)
